opinionTexts.li: The observed shaft appears quite compact, contrasting with the relatively full appearance of the scrotum. Its head is barely noticeable.
A quick glance confirms a miniature form, the glans barely larger than a fingertip, a distinctly understated presentation.
The private part was visible. Its anatomy seemed rather diminutive, especially the shaft and head.
The exposed genital area is quite small, with the foreskin appearing somewhat loose around a very tiny tip.
A remarkably tiny organ; the glans is small and the shaft rather narrow. Not much to look at.
The penis looks somewhat shriveled, the balls slightly larger in comparison, suggesting minimal recent activity.
A brief view revealed a remarkably micro-sized penis, the shaft thin and almost disappearing into the pubic area.
The observed private part presented as unusually small, with a narrow shaft and a barely defined head, certainly not imposing.
It was there, unassuming in its small stature, the glans hardly wider than the shaft. A very neutral sight.
The overall impression is one of miniature proportions, the foreskin slightly covering a tiny, inconspicuous glans.
A very small penis was visible, the head and shaft forming a compact unit, barely extending from the body.
The visible anatomy includes a slender shaft and a minimal glans, fitting compactly against the lower abdomen.
The proportions are notably tiny, with both the penis shaft and glans appearing much smaller than expected.
A brief observation of {PAWN_nameShortPossessive} anatomy reveals a decidedly small penis and proportionately scaled testicles.
The private part, though present, is quite small, with a rather smooth shaft and a tiny, almost unnoticeable head.
The entire genital area appears somewhat compact, the penis itself quite micro, barely presenting any significant form.
A quick look revealed a micro-sized penis, the shaft and head blending into a remarkably unassuming form.
Its size is undeniably micro, the glans small and the shaft quite narrow, nestled closely against {PAWN_nameShortPossessive} body.
The observed organ is very small, the balls appearing disproportionately large next to the slender shaft and head.
The visible penis is truly tiny, the shaft and glans compact and unassuming, a rather neutral and unremarkable sight.
